content: slouchy or beanie style hat with a brim that is made to allow comfortable stretching almost like knit the pattern is written to be adjusted to any size within the repeat of the pattern based on measurements but i ve personally only used it to make adult sized hats suggested materials size e hook approx 300 yards of sock weight wool yarn adult sized hat yarn needle optional pom pom solid colored or tonal yarn works best for this project so that the lace can be visible i ve included pictures of the hat using varigated yarn as well the photos show the slouchy hat style with and without a pom pom use sock weight wool for an extra warm hat with a stretchy brim that can protect your ears pattern is worked in the round and does not decrease the tube is cinched at the end of the hat for slouchy fit this pattern is suitable for advanced beginners special stitches include half_double_crochet back stitch only half_double_crochet double_crochet decrease dc3tog errata row 2 has been altered slightly to include skip 2 st at the end of each repeat which was ambiguous before
